metadata.task_description: Move the task 'Design mockups' from 'To Do' section to 'In Progress' section and add a comment 'Started working on initial wireframes'

judgement.reasoning: The user requested three main actions: navigate to Asana, move the task 'Design mockups' from 'To Do' to 'In Progress', and add a specific comment. The agent successfully navigated to the site and opened the 'Website Redesign' project. Since the 'In Progress' section did not exist in the Board view, the agent correctly created it. Then, the agent opened the 'Design mockups' task and updated its section to 'In Progress' via the task details panel. Finally, the agent added the required comment 'Started working on initial wireframes'. All steps were executed correctly, and the final state reflects the successful completion of all user requirements. The trajectory was logical and efficient.

steps.title: Asana
steps.description: The ultimate objective is to move the task 'Design mockups' from 'To Do' to 'In Progress' and add a comment. The current view is the Asana Home page, showing 'My tasks' and 'Projects'. I need to navigate to the project containing the task 'Design mockups'. Since I don't see 'Design mockups' in 'My tasks', I will assume it is within the 'Website Redesign' project, which is visible on the left sidebar and in the 'Projects' section. I will click on 'Website Redesign' to navigate to the project board.

steps.title: Home - Asana
steps.description: The previous step successfully navigated to the 'Website Redesign' project, and the current view is the project list. The task is to move 'Design mockups' from 'To Do' to 'In Progress' and add a comment. Since the current view is a List, it is easier to move tasks between sections in the 'Board' view. steps.title: Website Redesign - Asana
steps.description: The previous step successfully switched the project view to 'Board'. The current state shows one column titled 'Untitled section', which I will assume is 'To Do' since all tasks are there. I need to create an 'In Progress' section, move the 'Design mockups' task to it, and then add a comment to the task. First, I will create the 'In Progress' section by clicking 'Add section' (index 2455).

steps.title: Website Redesign - Asana
steps.description: The previous step successfully clicked 'Add section', which resulted in a new input field labeled 'New section' appearing. The next immediate goal is to name this new section 'In Progress'. I will use the input action to enter the name into the textarea with index 2869. After entering the text, I'll need to press Enter to confirm the section creation.

steps.title: Website Redesign - Asana
steps.description: The previous step successfully created the 'In Progress' section. The current state shows two sections: 'Untitled section' (which I assume is 'To Do') and 'In Progress'. The next goal is to move the task 'Design mockups' from 'Untitled section' to 'In Progress'. The task 'Design mockups' is visible in the first column. Since I cannot perform a drag-and-drop action, I will click on the task 'Design mockups' to open its details panel, where I can change its section or add a comment. The task 'Design mockups' is associated with index 2622 (or one of its children). I will click on the task card itself, index 2622.

steps.title: Website Redesign - Asana
steps.description: The previous step successfully clicked on the 'Design mockups' task card. The current state is expected to be a task details panel opened on the right side of the screen, although the screenshot shows a placeholder area on the right. The next immediate goal is twofold: first, move the task to the 'In Progress' section, and second, add the comment. Since I cannot drag and drop, I'll look for a way to change the section/column within the task details panel. If the task details panel is open, I should look for a field that indicates the current section/project column. Since the task details panel is not fully visible in the interactive elements, I will assume it's loaded and look for elements related to section or column change, or simply the comment box. I will scroll down to ensure I see the full task detail pane. However, the screenshot shows the task card highlighted, but no task detail pane is visible yet. I will wait a moment and try to scroll. Since there is a scroll container [1275] which is an iframe, I will try to scroll the main page first.

steps.title: Website Redesign - Asana
steps.description: The previous step successfully opened the 'Design mockups' task details panel. The current UI state shows the task details on the right side of the screen. The task is currently in the 'Website Redesign' project under the 'Untitled section'. The next immediate goal is to change the section from 'Untitled section' to 'In Progress' and then add the required comment. I see a button with the text 'Untitled section' (index 3373) next to 'Website Redesign' under 'Projects'. I will click this to open the section selection dropdown.

steps.title: Website Redesign - Asana
steps.description: The previous step successfully opened the section selection dropdown within the task details panel. The current UI state shows the options 'Untitled section' (selected) and 'In Progress'. The next immediate goal is to move the task to 'In Progress' by clicking on the 'In Progress' option in the dropdown list. This option is represented by index 3437. After moving the task, I will proceed to add the comment.

steps.title: Website Redesign - Asana
steps.description: The previous step successfully moved the task 'Design mockups' to the 'In Progress' section, as confirmed by the text "In Progress" next to "Website Redesign" in the task details panel. The task is now correctly moved. The next goal is to add the comment: 'Started working on initial wireframes'. I need to locate the comment input field and then the 'Comment' button to submit it. The comment input field is labeled "Add a comment" and is associated with the contenteditable div [3264]. I will input the text there and then click the 'Comment' button [3270].
steps.step_task: Typed 'Started working on initial wireframes' | Clicked div role=button "Comment"

steps.title: Website Redesign - Asana
steps.description: The previous step successfully added the comment "Started working on initial wireframes" to the task 'Design mockups'. The task 'Design mockups' is already moved to the 'In Progress' section. The current UI state shows the task details panel with the new comment visible in the 'Comments' section. Both parts of the ultimate objective have been completed. I can now conclude the task.
